body:
# 0.6.0

## Setup
```python
bazel_dep(name = "rules_venv", version = "0.6.0")
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv


## What's Changed
* Update docs by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/72
* Remove unnecessary toolchain requirement for `py_venv_library` by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/73
* Release 0.6.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/74


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.5.0...0.6.0

# 0.5.0

## Setup
```python
bazel_dep(name = "rules_venv", version = "0.5.0")
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv


## What's Changed
* Fix warnings on windows during cleanup by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/70
* Update various internal environment variables by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/71
* Bump rules_cc by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/66
* Added pytest rules by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/69
* Release 0.5.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/67


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.4.1...0.5.0

# 0.4.1

## Setup
```python
bazel_dep(name = "rules_venv", version = "0.4.1")
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv


## What's Changed
* Fix use of runfiles with spaces by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/65
* Release 0.4.1 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/68


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.4.0...0.4.1

# 0.4.0

## Setup
```python
bazel_dep(name = "rules_venv", version = "0.4.0")
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv


## What's Changed
* Fix github actions by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/62
* Bump bzlmod depednencies by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/61
* Fix broken mypy targets by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/64
* Release 0.4.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/63


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.3.1...0.4.0

# 0.3.1

## bzlmod
```python
bazel_dep(name = "rules_venv", version = "0.3.1")
```

## WORKSPACE
```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_venv",
    integrity = "sha256-fAy91mJRW4ualNZnU2ob+ZM6inZLcMq3KbrHl0Ed+gQ=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/releases/download/0.3.1/rules_venv-0.3.1.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv


## What's Changed
* Avoid lookup error when passing toolchains to binaries. by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/55
* Fixed global_venv tool pointing to old paths by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/56
* Updated bash runfiles to refer to `rules_shell` by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/58
* Release 0.3.1 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/59


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.3.0...0.3.1

# 0.3.0

## bzlmod
```python
bazel_dep(name = "rules_venv", version = "0.3.0")
```

## WORKSPACE
```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_venv",
    integrity = "sha256-ixJnCkFUE/xJBVvh5kTW4pDI03lwZVCtgsu+iUsW3gI=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/releases/download/0.3.0/rules_venv-0.3.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv


## What's Changed
* Added usage of `*` for wheel packages by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/39
* Added license by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/40
* Added black rules. by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/41
* Added isort rules by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/42
* Added module_extension rules by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/44
* Fix linux c extensions by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/45
* Fixed isort fixer for root package targets by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/46
* Added support for embedding args and env in zipapps by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/47
* Fixed C Extensions for armv7 machines by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/48
* Added pylint rules by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/43
* Added support for stripped binaries in c extensions by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/51
* Update zipapp rules to work with rules_python binaries by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/53
* Added mypy rules by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/49
* Fix zipapps with runfiles with spaces by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/54
* Release 0.3.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/50


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.2.0...0.3.0

## What's Changed
* Added `py_wheel_library` rule. by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/36
* Release 0.2.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/38


Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv


## What's Changed
* Re-release version 0.1.0 by @sputt in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/27
* Fix conflicted version file by @sputt in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/28
* Added github pages by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/30
* Fix docs publisher by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/31
* Fix docs publisher by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/32
* Allow explicitly leaking entrypoint venv. by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/29
* Fix docs publisher by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/33
* Release 0.1.3 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/34


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.1.2...0.1.3

# 0.1.0

## bzlmod
```python

```

## WORKSPACE
```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_venv",
    integrity = "sha256-u0kNM2dDB+QDm8Mcdq9iyYl8UslBBsMx5+vRDJhvh2M=",

)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv


## What's Changed
* Enable bzlmod and split zipapp into a separate rule. by @sputt in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/24


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.0.9...0.1.0

## What's Changed
* Create zip files in memory before writing to disk. by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/9
* Release 0.0.3 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/10
* Release 0.0.4 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/11

# 0.0.3

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_venv",
    integrity = "sha256-bpCnHTsR9hFUovuLcaccSV8xXshOvd+XAF6XvTTyTxc=",

)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv


## What's Changed
* Allow `RULES_VENV_DEBUG` environment variable to enable all debug logs by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/5
* Write venv runfiles outside the venv directory by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/6
* Release v0.0.3 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/7


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.0.2...0.0.3

# 0.0.2

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_venv",
    integrity = "sha256-9XskSxoCowVITC99PqumMKisgX/GRYHrX3qyciI7LgU=",
```

## What's Changed
* Renames for transfer by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/1
* Address permission issues when creating runfiles by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/2
* Fix `py_venv_library` not propagating runfiles. by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/3
* Release v0.0.2 by @abrisco in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/4

## New Contributors
* @abrisco made their first contribution in https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/periareon/rules_venv/compare/0.0.1...0.0.2
